title: Phase 1: Static UI with mock data
description: Build all components with mock data - fully functional UI with hardcoded data

title: Build modal components
description: Modal (reusable container), AddNoteModal (coverage note form), UploadModal (file upload + URL fetch), Autocomplete (medication/insurance), OutcomeSelector, FileDropzone

title: Create mock data and types
description: Define TypeScript types in src/types/api.ts (SearchResult, Medication, InsurancePlan, CoverageDocument, Stats) and create mock data for all components

title: Set up API client with auth interceptor
description: Create axios client with baseURL from VITE_API_URL, JWT token interceptor, Content-Type headers

title: Add error boundaries
description: Implement React error boundaries with fallback UI for component errors

title: Phase 3: Polish
description: Animations, accessibility, error boundaries, and performance optimization

title: Build card components
description: StatsGrid (4-column), StatCard (value, label, trend), CategoryCard (med category with tags), ResultCard (search result), DocumentCard, OutcomeBadge (approved/denied/pending)

title: Add responsive design
description: Implement responsive breakpoints: desktop (>1200px full layout), tablet (900-1200px 2-col stats), mobile (<900px hamburger menu, stacked layout). Ensure 44px min touch targets

title: Set up Vite + React + TypeScript project
description: Initialize project with Vite, React 18+, TypeScript. Add dependencies: react-router-dom, @tanstack/react-query, axios, react-hook-form, zod, @hookform/resolvers, react-dropzone, clsx

title: Performance optimization
description: Implement lazy loading for routes, React.memo for expensive components, optimize re-renders

title: Accessibility audit
description: Add ARIA labels, focus trap in modals, semantic HTML (nav, main, aside, section), screen reader announcements, verify WCAG AA color contrast

title: Implement search with filters
description: Wire up SearchSection with useSearch hook, implement filter state management (state, medication_id, insurance_plan_id, type)

title: Configure Tailwind with custom design tokens
description: Set up Tailwind CSS with custom colors (teal-deep, coral, etc), typography (Fraunces, DM Sans), border radius, and shadows per PRD design system

title: Add animations and transitions
description: Implement fade-in, transitions for modals, cards, and page changes

title: Implement document upload flow
description: Connect UploadModal to useUploadDocument and useFetchDocument hooks, handle file upload and URL fetch

title: Replace mock data with API calls
description: Update all components to use TanStack Query hooks instead of mock data

title: Build search section components
description: SearchSection, SearchInput with icon, SuggestionChips (clickable suggested searches), FilterPills (toggleable filters for state/type)

title: Build Sidebar component
description: Navigation sidebar with logo, nav items (Search, Documents, Notes, Settings), medication categories, and practice selector

title: Phase 2: API Integration
description: Connect to backend API - fully integrated frontend

title: Implement TanStack Query hooks
description: Create hooks: useSearch (POST /coverage/search), useDocuments, useUploadDocument, useFetchDocument, useDeleteDocument, useMedications, useInsurancePlans, useStats

title: Implement keyboard navigation
description: Add keyboard support: Tab navigation, Enter to activate, Escape to close modals

title: Create AuthContext
description: Implement AuthContext with user, practice, token state and login/logout methods

title: Build shared UI components
description: Button (primary, secondary, coral variants), Input, Select, Textarea, Badge, LoadingSpinner, EmptyState components

title: User Management with Admin Role
description:
Implement simple admin role system with user management features:
- Add is_admin boolean field to users
- Admin users can create new users and reset passwords
- All users can change their own passwords
- Admin UI for user management

This provides basic user administration without the complexity of full RBAC.

title: Backend: Add is_admin field to User model
description:
Add is_admin boolean field to User model and create Alembic migration.

Changes needed:
- Update User model in app/models/user.py with is_admin field (default=False)
- Create Alembic migration to add column
- Update UserRead/UserCreate schemas as needed

Location: /Users/jrs/Library/CloudStorage/Dropbox/ryan/Projects/@inprogress_proj/practicetoolsapi

title: Frontend: Build User Management page (admin only)
description:
Create admin page to view and manage users.

Components:
- User list table (name, email, is_admin, created_at)
- 'Create User' button -> opens create modal
- 'Reset Password' action per user
- Delete user action (optional)
- Loading and error states
- Admin-only access via ProtectedRoute

Location: src/pages/admin/UserManagement.tsx

title: Frontend: Build Create User form (admin only)
description:
Create form/modal for admins to create new users.

Form fields:
- Name (required)
- Email (required)
- Temporary password (required)
- Is Admin checkbox (optional)

Features:
- Form validation (email format, required fields)
- Success message + refresh user list
- Error handling

title: Frontend: Build Reset Password form (admin only)
description:
Create form/modal for admins to reset user passwords.

Form fields:
- User selector (or passed from user list)
- New password (required)
- Confirm password (required)

Features:
- Password validation
- Success/error messages
- Modal that closes on success

title: Backend: Create require_admin auth dependency
description:
Create FastAPI dependency to protect admin-only routes.

Implementation:
- Add require_admin() dependency in auth_service.py
- Check current_user.is_admin, raise 403 if False
- Reuse get_current_user as base dependency

Location: /Users/jrs/Library/CloudStorage/Dropbox/ryan/Projects/@inprogress_proj/practicetoolsapi

title: Backend: Implement create user endpoint (admin only)
description:
Add POST /admin/auth/users endpoint for admins to create new users.

Endpoint specs:
- Route: POST /admin/auth/users
- Auth: Requires require_admin dependency
- Input: name, email, temporary_password, is_admin (optional)
- Returns: Created user (UserRead)
- Validates email uniqueness

Location: /Users/jrs/Library/CloudStorage/Dropbox/ryan/Projects/@inprogress_proj/practicetoolsapi

title: Backend: Implement admin password reset endpoint
description:
Add POST /admin/auth/users/{user_id}/reset-password endpoint for admins.

Endpoint specs:
- Route: POST /admin/auth/users/{user_id}/reset-password
- Auth: Requires require_admin dependency
- Input: new_password
- Returns: Success message
- Hashes password before saving

Location: /Users/jrs/Library/CloudStorage/Dropbox/ryan/Projects/@inprogress_proj/practicetoolsapi

title: Backend: Implement change password endpoint
description:
Add POST /admin/auth/change-password for users to change their own password.

Endpoint specs:
- Route: POST /admin/auth/change-password
- Auth: Requires authentication (get_current_user)
- Input: current_password, new_password
- Returns: Success message
- Validates current password before allowing change

Location: /Users/jrs/Library/CloudStorage/Dropbox/ryan/Projects/@inprogress_proj/practicetoolsapi

title: Frontend: Update User type with is_admin field
description:
Update TypeScript User interface to include is_admin field.

Changes:
- Update User interface in src/context/AuthContext.tsx
- Add is_admin: boolean field
- Update any other type definitions as needed

title: Frontend: Add API client functions for user management
description:
Add API client functions for new user management endpoints.

Functions to add:
- createUser(data) - POST /admin/auth/users
- resetUserPassword(userId, password) - POST /admin/auth/users/{id}/reset-password
- changePassword(currentPassword, newPassword) - POST /admin/auth/change-password
- listUsers() - GET /admin/auth/users

Location: Create new src/api/users.ts or add to existing API client

title: Frontend: Build Change Password page/modal
description:
Create UI for authenticated users to change their own password.

Requirements:
- Form with: current password, new password, confirm new password
- Validation: passwords match, minimum length
- Success/error states
- Can be modal or dedicated page
- Accessible from user menu/settings

title: Frontend: Add Admin navigation and routing
description:
Add admin-only navigation and routes.

Requirements:
- Check user.is_admin to conditionally show admin menu
- Add admin routes (protected with ProtectedRoute + admin check)
- Navigation item in sidebar/header for admin section
- Route: /admin/users for user management page

title: Add loading and error states
description: Implement loading spinners, skeleton screens, and error handling/display for all API operations

title: Build AppLayout component
description: Main layout with 260px sidebar and content area. Handle responsive breakpoints (desktop >1200px, tablet 900-1200px, mobile <900px)

title: Build PageHeader component
description: Page header with title, subtitle, and action buttons

title: Set up React Router and pages
